abstract: HarperCollins said on Monday it would acquire the Nashville-based publisher Thomas Nelson, bolstering the company's strength in the market for inspirational and religious books.
snippet: HarperCollins said on Monday it would acquire the Nashville-based publisher Thomas Nelson, bolstering the company's strength in the market for inspirational and religious books.
lead_paragraph: HarperCollins Publishers said on Monday that it would acquire Thomas Nelson, a publisher based in Nashville, bolstering the company's strength in the market for inspirational and religious books.
